info.name: Shopify
info.description:
More than 1,000,000 merchants use Shopify to run their businesses. They come in all sizes, from all around the world, and each one is different. Shopify solves many of their hardest commerce problems out of the boxu2014but every business has unique needs.

Contact Support:
 Name: No Contact
 Email: email@example.com
